directions: Gently toss the watermelon, peach, nectarine, plum, blueberries, and grapes together in a large bowl. Sprinkle the coconut and cinnamon over the fruit mixture and lightly stir to mix. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and chill in refrigerator at least 1 hour before serving. Top with whipped topping as desired.
ingredients: 1 large white peach, pitted and cut into small cubes
1 large nectarine, pitted and cut into small cubes
1 black plum, pitted and cut into small cubes
title: Summer Fruit Salad II
